mapper.insert: insert into WISDOM.TIMEKNOWLEDGE (PNO, PROCESSNO, PROCESSNAME, PROCESSTIME, FACTOR1, FACTOR2, FACTOR3, FACTOR4, FACTOR5) values (#{pno,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{processno,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{processname,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{processtime,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{factor1,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{factor2,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{factor3,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{factor4,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{factor5,jdbcType=CHAR})
mapper.select: select PNO, PROCESSNO, PROCESSNAME, PROCESSTIME, FACTOR1, FACTOR2, FACTOR3, FACTOR4, FACTOR5 from WISDOM.TIMEKNOWLEDGE
